The claim alleges that Nigeria: s Minister of Information and Culture, Lai Mohammed, criticized Biden for allowing Nnamdi Kanu, the leader of the separatist group Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), into the United States.
The claim states that Nigeria provided: 700 million to fund Biden's presidential campaign in 2020.
The expert: s verdict also highlights the US Federal Election Commission's regulations that prohibit foreign governments from donating to any presidential candidate and the absence of any record of Mohammed making such remarks about Biden.
